textAfterTable: Goaltenders: # Name Height Weight Date Of Birth Birthplace 60 Jose Theodore 5' 11" 185 Sep 13, 1976 Laval, QC, CAN 40 Semyon Varlamov 6' 2" 209 Apr 27, 1988 Samara, RUS CAPITALS' STATS: Quote: http://capitals.nhl.com/club/stats.htm FLYERS-CAPITALS' SERIES HISTORY: Current and Miscellaneous: The Flyers' all-time regular season W-L-T-OTL record is: 95-61-19-4. The Flyers' all-time home record is 56-27-6-1 The Flyers' all-time road record is 39-34-13-3. In 23 PO games, the Flyers are 11-12 including 6-4 at home and 5-8 away. The Caps won series in 1984 and 1988 while the Flyers won in 1989 and 2008. 1970s: November 9, 1974 -- In the first meeting between the teams, Bobby Clarke, Bill Barber and Tom Bladon each had three points in the Flyers' 6-2 home win.
